### Areas to Consider
- [ ] i18n 
    - Are all user-facing strings tagged?
- [ ] Right-to-left
    - Will the feature work for right-to-left languages?
- [ ] Mobile
    - Does the feature behave well at small sizes?
- [ ] Pattern Library
    - Does the new feature belong in the Pattern Library
